taskDescription: Tiana in an independent college student entering the sixth and final year of her engineering program. In the previous years, she took out student loans of $5,500, $8,470, $10,000, $7,890, and $11,900. She needs a loan to finish her final year. How much in federal subsidized and unsubsidized student loans can she obtain?
detailedSolution: Tiana can take out $12,500, the maximum in year 6.
